Cell * IntCell::copy (  )  const [virtual]

Copy the current cell.

Returns:
The copy of this cell. (return the cell itself if it is nil).

Cell * IntCell::eval_addition ( const Cell *  addend  )  const [virtual]

Add the current cell value to the addend cell value. (error if this is not a DoubleCell or IntCell).

Returns:
The sum of value in the two cell. Return a IntCell if both operand is IntCell, a DoubleCell otherwise.

Reimplemented from Cell.

Cell * IntCell::eval_divi ( const Cell *  dividend  )  const [virtual]

Divide the dividend cell value by the current cell value. (error if this is not a DoubleCell or IntCell).

Returns:
The fraction of value in the two cell. Return a IntCell if both operand is IntCell, a DoubleCell otherwise.

Reimplemented from Cell.

Cell * IntCell::eval_multi ( const Cell *  multiplier  )  const [virtual]

Multiply the current cell value by the multiplier cell value. (error if this is not a DoubleCell or IntCell).

Returns:
The product of value in the two cell. Return a IntCell if both operand is IntCell, a DoubleCell otherwise.

Reimplemented from Cell.

Cell * IntCell::eval_subtra ( const Cell *  minuend  )  const [virtual]

Subtract the minuend cell value with the current cell value. (error if this is not a DoubleCell or IntCell).

Returns:
The difference of value in the two cell. Return a IntCell if both operand is IntCell, a DoubleCell otherwise.

Reimplemented from Cell.

bool IntCell::less_than ( const Cell *  c  )  const [virtual]

Check whether value of this cell is less than value of c. (error if one of this cell or c is not of type IntCell or DoubleCell).

Returns:
True iff value of this cell is less than value of c.

bool IntCell::truth (  )  const [virtual]

Check if the the symbol in this cell is an operator. The truth value of the cell in an if statement.

Returns:
True iff the cell evaluates to non-zero value.

Implements Cell.
